Headline: Go-to expert in the audio industry | Strategic Marketing & Product Development Expert | Global Sourcing Specialist |Electronics Industry Leader
Comment:
Bang on point Rishabh Mariwala. I remember while doing my MBA from distance learning, the Marketing Management book that was sent to me was Kotler & Keller and I insisted on sending me a book that was more relevant to the Indian scenario. And I got one which was Kotler Keller Koshy & Jha. This was having case studies relevant to India and Indian brands. 

The way we do business and the way business is done in the West is very different.  The learnings are important and as rightly said by you Adapt not Adopt. Take cues and see what can be relevant in our context and adapt.
